name: Anchor
tips: Outline the jaw to a point; keep the soul patch connected.
maintenanceTips: Define the jawline to a clean point.
Keep sideburns tight to emphasize the anchor shape.
Trim the soul patch weekly.

name: Balbo
tips: Define the chin strap cleanly; keep the mustache disconnected.
maintenanceTips: Keep the chin strap narrow and sharp.
Clean the cheek line every few days.
Maintain the gap between mustache and chin.

name: Beardstache
description: Prominent mustache with minimal chin beard
tips: Keep the beard short; let the mustache stay fuller and combed.
maintenanceTips: Keep chin beard tight to emphasize the mustache.
Trim the mustache to avoid covering the lip line.
Use a light wax to set the shape.

name: Chevron
tips: Trim to the lip line; keep thickness even across the width.
maintenanceTips: Trim the bottom edge to follow the lip line.
Brush daily to keep the mustache neat.
Use scissors for precise edge control.

name: Circle Beard
tips: Connect mustache and chin; keep the circle symmetrical.
maintenanceTips: Keep the circle shape tight and symmetrical.
Use a detail trimmer for the outline.
Trim the chin length to match the mustache.

name: Designer Stubble
tips: Set a consistent guard; clean the neckline for contrast.
maintenanceTips: Use a guard to keep length even across the face.
Clean the neckline for a sharp contrast.
Moisturize the beard area after trimming.

name: Ducktail
description: Pointed beard shaped like a duck tail
tips: Blend the sides toward a point; keep the mustache neat.
maintenanceTips: Taper the beard toward the chin for a sharp point.
Brush downward to keep the sides sleek.
Trim the mustache line every week.

name: Ducktail Goatee
description: Pointed goatee shaped like duck tail
tips: Blend the goatee into a point; keep cheeks clean.
maintenanceTips: Taper the goatee to a clean point.
Keep cheeks and sideburns clean for contrast.
Trim weekly to maintain the shape.

name: Extended Goatee
tips: Extend the chin length; keep cheeks clean and lines sharp.
maintenanceTips: Keep cheeks clean to emphasize length.
Trim the chin regularly to keep it narrow.
Use a light balm to prevent frizz.

name: French Fork
description: Long beard split into two points
tips: Grow length first; ask for a clean split and tidy sides.
maintenanceTips: Use a beard balm to hold the split shape.
Keep length even and trim the fork lines monthly.
Brush daily to prevent tangles.

name: Friendly Mutton Chops
description: Full cheek whiskers with clean chin
tips: Keep the chin clean; blend sideburns into cheek whiskers.
maintenanceTips: Blend the sideburns into the cheek line.
Keep the chin cleanly shaved for contrast.
Trim the edges weekly to prevent bulk.

name: Full Beard
tips: Let it grow evenly for 3-4 weeks; ask for a clean neckline two fingers above the Adam's apple.
maintenanceTips: Brush daily to keep the beard tidy and reduce flyaways.
Use beard oil after washing to keep the hair soft.
Trim the neckline every week for a clean outline.

name: Garibaldi
tips: Let it grow full; round the bottom and keep the neckline clean.
maintenanceTips: Shape the bottom into a soft curve.
Keep the sides slightly shorter for structure.
Deep condition weekly to reduce frizz.

name: Goatee
tips: Keep the cheeks clean; define the chin outline with a sharp edge.
maintenanceTips: Keep the chin length consistent with a guard.
Edge the mustache line for a sharp separation.
Shave cheeks every 2-3 days for contrast.

name: Handlebar
tips: Keep the ends longer; use mustache wax and curl upward.
maintenanceTips: Let the ends grow and trim the center lightly.
Use wax to curl and set the tips.
Comb outward daily to train the shape.

name: Hipster
tips: Keep volume on the beard; brush downward and trim cheek lines.
maintenanceTips: Keep the mustache styled with light wax.
Brush the beard downward for a full shape.
Clean cheek lines to avoid bulk.

name: Pencil Stache
tips: Shave above and below for a thin line; keep edges crisp.
maintenanceTips: Shave the edges every other day to keep it thin.
Use a precision trimmer for clean lines.
Moisturize the upper lip to prevent irritation.

name: Pointed Full Beard
description: Pointed full beard with clean lines
tips: Taper into a point; keep edges sharp and even.
maintenanceTips: Shape the beard into a tapered point.
Keep the sides slightly shorter for definition.
Edge the neckline weekly for a sharp finish.

name: Short Beard
tips: Use a uniform guard length; define cheek and neck lines.
maintenanceTips: Trim with a short guard every week.
Keep the neckline clean for a tidy look.
Hydrate the skin to avoid dryness.

name: Stubble
tips: Agree on a guard length; keep the neckline tidy and follow the jawline.
maintenanceTips: Use a consistent guard to keep length even.
Clean the neckline twice a week for definition.
Moisturize to reduce itch and dryness.

name: Styled Beard
description: Full beard with beard oil and styling
tips: Apply beard oil; brush to shape and tame flyaways.
maintenanceTips: Apply beard oil daily to keep it healthy.
Brush downward to shape the beard evenly.
Trim stray hairs to maintain a polished look.

name: Trimmed & Shaped
description: Neatly trimmed beard with sharp lines
tips: Ask for a defined cheek line; keep the neckline crisp.
maintenanceTips: Keep cheek lines sharp with a trimmer.
Trim the neckline every week for a clean finish.
Brush the beard daily to keep the shape.

name: Van Dyke
tips: Separate the mustache and chin; keep cheeks and jaw clean.
maintenanceTips: Keep the mustache ends shaped with light wax.
Maintain a clean gap between mustache and chin.
Edge the soul patch weekly.

name: Verdi
description: Full beard with curled mustache tips
tips: Maintain length on the beard; curl the tips with wax and keep edges tidy.
maintenanceTips: Keep the beard fuller on the sides for balance.
Use mustache wax to style curled tips.
Clean the cheek line every few days.
